mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cfl_authority_user_mapping (auth_seq, user_seq) VALUES( (SELECT auth_seq FROM cfl_authority WHERE svc_nm = #{user.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{user.tenantId} AND auth_id = #{authorityId}) , (SELECT user_seq FROM cfl_user WHERE svc_nm = #{user.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{user.tenantId} AND user_id =#{user.userId}) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cfl_authority_user_mapping WHERE auth_seq = (SELECT auth_seq FROM cfl_authority WHERE svc_nm = #{user.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{user.tenantId} AND auth_id = #{authorityId}) AND user_seq = (SELECT user_seq FROM cfl_user WHERE svc_nm = #{user.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{user.tenantId} AND user_id =#{user.userId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cfl_object_authority_mapping (auth_seq, objt_seq) VALUES( (SELECT auth_seq FROM cfl_authority WHERE svc_nm = #{authority.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{authority.tenantId} AND auth_id = #{authority.authorityId}) , (SELECT objt_seq FROM cfl_object WHERE svc_nm = #{authority.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{authority.tenantId} AND objt_id =#{objectId}) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cfl_object_authority_mapping WHERE (SELECT auth_seq FROM cfl_authority WHERE svc_nm = #{authority.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{authority.tenantId} AND auth_id = #{authority.authorityId}) AND (SELECT objt_seq FROM cfl_object WHERE svc_nm = #{authority.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{authority.tenantId} AND objt_id =#{objectId})
mapper.select: SELECT ob.objt_id AS objectId ,sob.objt_id AS subObjectId FROM cfl_object ob INNER JOIN cfl_object_subobject_mapping sobm ON ob.objt_seq = sobm.objt_seq INNER JOIN cfl_object sob ON sobm.sub_objt_seq = sob.objt_seq WHERE ob.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND ob.tnnt_id = #{tenantId}

SELECT auth.* FROM cfl_object ob INNER JOIN cfl_object_authority_mapping authm ON ob.objt_seq = authm.objt_seq INNER JOIN cfl_authority auth ON authm.auth_seq = auth.auth_seq WHERE ob.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND ob.tnnt_id = #{tenantId} AND ob.objt_id = #{objectId}

SELECT auth.* FROM cfl_user user INNER JOIN cfl_authority_user_mapping authm ON user.user_seq = authm.user_seq INNER JOIN cfl_authority auth ON authm.auth_seq = auth.auth_seq WHERE user.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND user.tnnt_id = #{tenantId} AND user.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT user.* FROM cfl_user user INNER JOIN cfl_authority_user_mapping authm ON user.user_seq = authm.user_seq INNER JOIN cfl_authority auth ON authm.auth_seq = auth.auth_seq WHERE auth.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND auth.tnnt_id = #{tenantId} AND auth.auth_id = #{authorityId}

SELECT ob.objt_id AS objectId , auth.auth_seq AS authoritySequence , auth.auth_id AS authorityId , auth.auth_nm AS authorityName , auth.auth_type AS authorityType , auth.tnnt_id AS tenantId , auth.svc_nm AS serviceName FROM cfl_object ob INNER JOIN cfl_object_authority_mapping authm ON ob.objt_seq = authm.objt_seq INNER JOIN cfl_authority auth ON auth.auth_seq = authm.auth_seq WHERE ob.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND ob.tnnt_id = #{tenantId}

SELECT auth.auth_id AS authorityId , user.user_seq AS userSequence , user.user_id AS userId , user.user_type AS userType , user.tnnt_id AS tenantId , user.svc_nm AS serviceName FROM cfl_authority auth INNER JOIN cfl_authority_user_mapping aum ON auth.auth_seq = aum.auth_seq INNER JOIN cfl_user user ON user.user_seq = aum.user_seq WHERE auth.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND auth.tnnt_id = #{tenantId}

SELECT if(count(*) > 0, 'true', 'false') FROM cfl_user user INNER JOIN cfl_authority_user_mapping authm ON user.user_seq = authm.user_seq INNER JOIN cfl_authority auth ON authm.auth_seq = auth.auth_seq WHERE auth.auth_id = #{authorityId} AND user.user_id = #{user.userId}

SELECT if(count(*) > 0, 'true', 'false') FROM cfl_authority auth INNER JOIN cfl_object_authority_mapping oam ON auth.auth_seq = oam.auth_seq INNER JOIN cfl_object ob ON oam.objt_seq = ob.objt_seq WHERE ob.objt_id = #{objectId} AND auth.auth_id = #{authority.authorityId}
